title: Lux is in every ARAM ever
body:
I have over 1000 ARAMs on my main account alone. She's in practically every game. I have friends around and we play ARAMs overnight to see Lux, Lux, Lux endlessly. I had one game just tonight where I rerolled out of Lux out of annoyance of seeing her again, to see the enemy team then rerolled into Lux.

It's getting beyond a joke. It's as if there's a select little list of champions you see in almost every ARAM, like they have higher odds or something. My buddies and I own all the champs but it's basically guaranteed that we'll see Lux or Ziggs on our team. How?

{{champion:99}}  <- Why have you skewed the code to keep this face in every game, Rito?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This would be better suited for the [Misc](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) or [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) boards, this board is for help & support with technical issues.

Although I don't see lux often in ARAM, however it's possible the reason you're running into her more often than other champs is she's relatively cheap compared to other champs.
